page.title: 17INDUSTRY1 Kirmington/Croxton
page.content: There is a variety of Industry and commerce in the square.Quarries employ most,then oil storage / distribution, haulage & small firms. Employed: Quarries 81,Oil misc.27, haulage 12,small firms 7. QUARRYING:one of the oldest industries The chalk seam extends from one foot under the surface to the water table. SINGLETON BIRCH Ltd.employs 80 at its Melton Ross quarry,near the villages, adjacent to the main railway line. It was started by William Singleton Birch in 1856 with a lease from the Yarboroughs.One of the main customers for burnt lime since 1875 is the Steel works at Scunthorpe. Hydrated lime, stone for backfill, agricultural lime & chalk for mushrooms are also sold.It employs lorry drivers, maintenance, operators,office staff, chemists and management. Few live in the square.
